'''''Amon Hen'' 153''' is the one-hundred-and-fifty-third issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in September [[1998]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''Untitled''
** By: Alexander Ormerod
* Editorial
** By: Andrew McMurry
* Contents
* Bywater Announcements
** By: Malcolm Lindley
* Announcements
* The 1999 Seminar
** By: [[Matthew Vernon]]
* ''LotR Oracle''
** By: Malcolm Lindley
* Summermoot
** By: [[John Ellison]]
* The 1999 Italian Calendar
** By: [[Patricia Reynolds|Pat Reynolds]] & Trevor Reynolds
* The Italian Middle-earth Diary
** By: [[Patricia Reynolds|Pat Reynolds]] & Trevor Reynolds
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: [[Sally Kennett]]
* Tolkien's Ravens
** By: [[Ruth Lacon]]
* Letters Pages
* News From Fangorn
** By: Lucy Ritchie
* Hildifons's Half of Amon Hen
** By: [[Sumner Gary Hunnewell|Gary Hunnewell]]
* Sally's Snippets
** By: [[Sally Kennett]]
* Mathom
** By: Ian Collier & Anke Buttner
* Tolk Folk
* New Members/Committee
